channel.title: [Shard} Exp Rates
channel.description:
I have been hosting a very successfull shard based server... im looking to add an option when the player begins to choose their exp rate i want give them like 3 options of 1-300, 1-600, or 1-1000 if you have any ideas on where i can begin id be very grateful... i have made up an interface for it.. i just need help creating the base for it ... link to a tut or general help will be nice :: thx
TYCO

item.title: [Shard} Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Since you’ve already made the interface for it, all you would have to do is add the appropriate event listeners to the server, set the experience rate for the player, add the appropriate fields for saving/loading, and change the methods that add experience to include the players multiplier.

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard} Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @_tyco +tyco+
item.description:
@_tyco wrote:

LULZ … Nothing to do with what i asked but thx i guess … ~facepalm#

TYCo

Read full topic

item.title: [Shard} Exp Rates
item.dc:creator: @concript concript
item.description:
@concript wrote:

Search for a specific file called config.java, Then scroll down till u see something like XPRATE_Melee etc.
the amount is ur damage x that.

Read full topic
